careers.title: Doctor
careers.description: A medical professional who diagnoses and treats illnesses, injuries, and other health-related issues.
careers.education: MBBS or equivalent degree followed by specialization.

careers.title: Engineer
careers.description: A professional who applies scientific and mathematical principles to develop solutions to technical problems.
careers.education: Bachelor's degree in Engineering (various specializations available).

careers.title: Teacher
careers.description: An educator who imparts knowledge and skills to students in a school, college, or university.
careers.education: Bachelor's degree in Education or a subject-specific degree with teaching certification.

careers.title: Data Scientist
careers.description: A specialist who analyzes complex data to help organizations make informed decisions.
careers.education: Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or related fields.

careers.title: Software Developer
careers.description: A professional who designs, develops, and maintains software applications.
careers.education: Degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.

careers.title: Architect
careers.description: A professional who designs buildings and oversees construction projects.
careers.education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Architecture.

careers.title: Graphic Designer
careers.description: A creative professional who designs visual content for various media.
careers.education: Degree or diploma in Graphic Design.

careers.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
careers.description: An IT expert responsible for protecting systems and networks from cyber threats.
careers.education: Degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, or related fields.

careers.title: Digital Marketer
careers.description: A specialist who promotes brands using digital platforms and tools.
careers.education: Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields.

careers.title: Veterinarian
careers.description: A medical professional who provides healthcare to animals.
careers.education: Degree in Veterinary Medicine (DVM).

careers.title: Pilot
careers.description: A trained professional who operates and controls aircraft.
careers.education: Commercial Pilot License (CPL) and specialized training.

careers.title: Journalist
careers.description: A professional who investigates and reports on news and current events.
careers.education: Degree in Journalism, Mass Communication, or related fields.

careers.title: Chartered Accountant
careers.description: A financial professional specializing in accounting, auditing, and taxation.
careers.education: CA certification and bachelor's degree in Commerce or related fields.

careers.title: Psychologist
careers.description: A mental health professional who studies human behavior and provides therapy.
careers.education: Master's or Doctoral degree in Psychology.

careers.title: Actuary
careers.description: A professional who uses mathematics, statistics, and financial theory to analyze risk.
careers.education: Degree in Actuarial Science, Mathematics, or related fields.

careers.title: Environmental Scientist
careers.description: A scientist who studies and works to improve the environment.
careers.education: Degree in Environmental Science or related fields.

careers.title: Event Planner
careers.description: A professional who organizes and manages events like weddings, conferences, and parties.
careers.education: Degree or diploma in Event Management.

careers.title: Chef
careers.description: A culinary professional who prepares and presents food.
careers.education: Diploma or degree in Culinary Arts.

careers.title: Game Developer
careers.description: A professional who designs and develops video games.
careers.education: Degree in Game Design, Computer Science, or related fields.

careers.title: Pharmacist
careers.description: A healthcare professional who prepares and dispenses medication.
careers.education: Bachelor's or Doctorate degree in Pharmacy.

careers.title: Physiotherapist
careers.description: A healthcare professional who helps patients regain mobility and manage pain through physical therapy.
careers.education: Degree in Physiotherapy (BPT or MPT).

careers.title: Social Worker
careers.description: A professional who supports individuals and communities to overcome challenges and improve well-being.
careers.education: Degree in Social Work or related fields.

careers.title: Robotics Engineer
careers.description: A professional who designs, builds, and tests robots and robotic systems.
careers.education: Degree in Robotics Engineering or related fields.

careers.title: Fashion Stylist
careers.description: A professional who curates clothing and accessories to create specific looks for clients.
careers.education: Diploma or degree in Fashion Styling or related fields.

careers.title: Fitness Trainer
careers.description: A specialist who guides individuals in achieving physical fitness and health goals.
careers.education: Certification in Fitness Training or related fields.

careers.title: Biomedical Engineer
careers.description: An engineer who develops medical devices and equipment to improve healthcare.
careers.education: Degree in Biomedical Engineering.

careers.title: AI Specialist
careers.description: A professional who develops artificial intelligence systems and applications.
careers.education: Degree in Computer Science or Artificial Intelligence.

careers.title: Actress/Actor
careers.description: A performer who portrays characters in film, television, theater, or other media.
careers.education: Diploma or degree in Performing Arts.

careers.title: UX/UI Designer
careers.description: A designer who enhances user experiences by optimizing interfaces of digital products.
careers.education: Degree in Design, Computer Science, or related fields.

careers.title: Astronomer
careers.description: A scientist who studies celestial objects, space, and the universe.
careers.education: Degree in Astronomy, Astrophysics, or Physics.

careers.title: Chef
careers.description: A culinary expert responsible for preparing meals and managing kitchen operations.
careers.education: Diploma or degree in Culinary Arts.

careers.title: HR Manager
careers.description: A professional managing hiring, employee relations, and organizational development.
careers.education: Degree in Human Resource Management.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.description: A scientist studying marine life and ecosystems.
careers.education: Degree in Marine Biology or related fields.

careers.title: Animator
careers.description: A professional who creates animations for movies, games, or other media.
careers.education: Degree or diploma in Animation.

careers.title: Environmental Lawyer
careers.description: A legal professional advocating for environmental protection and sustainable practices.
careers.education: Law degree with specialization in Environmental Law.

careers.title: Economist
careers.description: A professional analyzing economic trends and advising on financial policies.
careers.education: Degree in Economics or related fields.

careers.title: Geologist
careers.description: A scientist studying Earth's physical structure and substances.
careers.education: Degree in Geology or Earth Sciences.

careers.title: Sound Engineer
careers.description: A technician managing audio quality for various media productions.
careers.education: Degree or diploma in Sound Engineering.

careers.title: Travel Blogger
careers.description: A content creator who shares travel experiences and tips.
careers.education: No formal education required; writing or media skills recommended.

careers.title: Public Relations Specialist
careers.description: A professional managing a company's image and communication with the public.
careers.education: Degree in Public Relations, Communications, or Marketing.
